name: Testing Figma Interactive Components
description:
Hey Figma!

I've been testing the new interactive components and this file has some of those experiments.

I will use it as main shared file for those tests, I will be including more examples the next days.


Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any suggestion!


(You need to sign up to the beta to properly use the interactive components)


Added New Examples:

Switch

Switch Micro-interaction

Loops

Dropdown Menu

Dropdown Menu using Nested Interactive Components

Sprite Interaction
